title: Zeri & Mina (From Dawngate)
body: Riot, you should find a way to get EA to give you these Characters from Dawngate(a now closed and shut down MOBA) they were literally the most creative and AWSOME characters ever, their designs, their gameplay style, EVERYTHING! i think everyone gets my point, here are a pic of Mina"The Tyrant" and Zeri"The Painter"! :D

replies.body:
Dawngate was such a great game.........EA i hate you forever for canceling such a great MOBA that so much potential.

when it was on server both Zeri & Mina were my main Supportive Shapers, mostly Mina but still they both were BOSS!

I didn't get to play Dawngate, but Mina looks like a cross between Orianna and Ragdoll Poppy, while Zeri looks like a lot of Art Students I used to know. I'm gonna check out their kits because they look really fun.

Don't forget to [check out their lines](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hh8GZdSXPU8), Dawngate was pretty good at making their shapers people (better than League) and had a some pretty great shaper interactions.

Hey awesome. I know I already linked it but, http://www.moba-champion.com/shapers/
There's a link to ALLL the characters with all their kits(+Maths on it as well!)

Hopefully you guys at the dev team can help us out.

Mina's kit was based mostly around her ability to "Key" into other Shapers, making her untargetable like {{champion:429}} 's ult target, only she controlled when she went in and when she left, she could cast her other abilities while keyed into a champion she took 40% of damage that the champ took but she was constantly generating a shield, similar to {{champion:54}} s passive, but based on her Power ,AP equivilent, and increased their movement speed by 10% of hers
I was kinda obsessed in case ppl hadn't noticed ^.^

Hello rito worker, i'm very glad you are taking interest in the Shapers of Dawngate, the game was AMAZING btw, and i really miss it ;w; and their kits were really fitting and nice, Mina had an ability where she posseses the body of an ally, and can use her abilities while inside them, imagine a Mina and Kalista bot lane AMAZING XD zeri was just an awsome character in general, and her personality was everyones favorite. :) oh and yeah, there were some pretty funny things Dawngate had the characters say etc... they even had the character voices as announcers, AND THEY WERE AMAZING! mina and Zeri were obvi my favs, mina would say things like "They broke my binding... BREAK THEIR ARMS!" and "Aaaahahahahaaaa, kill more in my name!" etc... etc... Zeri was more like "Hey i'm zeri and i get to announce stuff!, this will be fun!" and "Awwww, they touched my binding..." etc... :p

Hello rito worker, i'm very glad you are taking interest in the Shapers of Dawngate, the game was AMAZING btw, and i really miss it ;w; and their kits were really fitting and nice, Mina had an ability where she posseses the body of an ally, and can use her abilities while inside them, imagine a Mina and Kalista bot lane AMAZING XD zeri was just an awsome character in general, and her personality was everyones favorite. :)

If Riot brought Mina into League, I would pledge my allegiance, soul, and wallet to Rito.

All Hail Sameg Toir!!!
Those two where the main reason I tried Dawngate... Now I feel bad because I didn't played very much <<

LOVED Mina ^.^ me and a buddy used to put Mina into a the otter jungler champion and we would gank people together cause of all of the crazy mobility. build her strait power and she gets pretty ridiculous really quickly
Mina Moya was a devastating combo matched only by the horrendousness that was Mina X Freia

Ooh my god MinaFreya was soo awesome as well, we tried a bunch of combo's but those two worked best. We only got to try MinaKindra twice before the servers went down but it seemed like it would be similarly rediculous

When I played Dawngate Mina was honestly my favorite shaper. She was such an interestingly fun support and I hadn't ever heard or seen one like her. I would love it if Riot would add some type of champion like Mina.
Why the heck not, we dont have any painter/fighter in the roster.
<3 ^-^ I KNOW RIGHT!!! they would fit right in too!

> [{quoted}](name=Sachi San,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zUeG6901,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-24T17:36:28.322+0000)
>
> <3 ^-^ I KNOW RIGHT!!! they would fit right in too!

Zeri could be part of Ionia, Mina could be a Yordle/ or girl corrupted by the Shadow Isles.
I really like this placement, quite a lot.
HOLY CRAP! amazing ideas :o

> [{quoted}](name=Sachi San,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zUeG6901,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-24T17:54:10.301+0000)
>
> HOLY CRAP! amazing ideas :o

I mean, just by looking at them thats where I would put them.

I dont mean to be that kind of self promoting asshole but

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/x5RsQ2lU-amren-in-honour-of-the-fallen

If you want I could try to translate their kits the same way? And see what we can do with Riot?
Also praise be, more dawngate love is always welcome
splendid <3 :3
I've attempted to emulate Mina's play style, this is the... third? iteration of this kit.
anyone have a good link for their kits?
http://www.moba-champion.com/shapers/

I loved the concept behind Mina, although I only played her twice.

R.I.P. Dawngate.
No.
Yes.

> [{quoted}](name=Sachi San,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zUeG6901,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-04-24T19:54:05.707+0000)
>
> Yes.

No because it will never happen. If it's a creative character you can't do anything. It has copyright.

> Riot, you should find a way to get EA to give you these Characters from Dawngate

Yes Riot can do something they could buy the rights to these characters or a licence to use them if EA was willing to sell them (for either a fixed sum or possibly with a cut of the sales made from those characters)... which I wouldn't really see why not as I don't really see what EA would do with them... but hey maybe they have some plans or something

How about.... this isn't Dawngate.  This is League of Legends.
So.... No.

At least the concept of Mina- you of course wouldn't just take one of the shapers and put it in LoL. That'd be pretty lame. But re-use the concepts so the dev's ideas aren't lost to the corporate machine that is EA.
You could just make her more  "ghosty" that "possesses" people instead of a "doll" that "keys" into people. That would solve the copyright problem.

> [{quoted}](name=Champion Skin,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zUeG6901,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-24T22:05:24.890+0000)
>
> Yes Riot can do something they could buy the rights to these characters or a licence to use them if EA was willing to sell them (for either a fixed sum or possibly with a cut of the sales made from those characters)... which I wouldn't really see why not as I don't really see what EA would do with them... but hey maybe they have some plans or something

They're paying for champion making team, why are you thinking they would pay for copyrights of this characters?

I <3 Mina.

I liked her ability to link to an ally and just be carried around and helping.

Although her burst upon coming out was pretty insane. 100-0ing 3 people after being carried around for 5 minutes felt pretty stupid.
Isn't Zeri somewhat like Lulu? I remember her ult to be a 1:1 copy at least.

Kinda there are similarities to a degree but, really her ult was more like an ally targetable Nasus ult.

R
Prismatic Vortex
Zeri wards target ally with a vibrant spell, instantly granting them 300 / 400 / 500 (+1.15) bonus Health for 5 seconds. In addition, that ally drains 10 / 15 / 20 (+0.025) Power from each nearby enemy shaper and 3 / 4 / 5 from each other nearby enemy.
That game was fantastic. I remember some kind of otter that was really awesome. My favorite was a healer who was sort of a mix between Vlad and Malz. Good times.

YEAH MOYA, FAV.
I made her kit like aeons ago as a concept on the boards but people didn't seem to take to kindly to it. >~>;;

OR!
Give lulu a skin that looks exactly like mina
and make a painter fiora skin to look kinda like that zeri character

Everyone's happy!
*"It will **EAT** your **FACE**!*
Never gonna happen unless ea gets paid for it which we all know they ain't. I will never give ea another dime ever again.
